name: SarahMemory AiOS Default SoftPack
description: Baseline cross-platform software integrations: OS-default open/reveal, light software scanner, and capability router. Designed to work even when SystemLearn/registry ingest has not been run.
notes: All sub-addons live inside this bundle directory (no com.softdev0.* naming) to avoid confusion with Drivers.
Addon loader should support bundles by scanning subfolders for manifest.json + addon.py and registering each as a callable unit.
